task.title: Pushing commits to the remote repository
task.shortdesc: When your local branch is ahead of the remote branch by one or more commits, you can push the new commits to make them available to other contributors.

step.cmd: To publish your changes, in the Git Staging view toolbar, click the Push to remote/branch icon.

result.p: If the push was successful, your local and remote branches are now up-to-date.
